basic_story.tagline: We support immigrant integration, building a welcoming city, one conversation at a time!
basic_story.story:
Let's Talk Philly! Conversation Circles
Is an organization made up of immigrants and refugees from diverse countries and cultures working together to improve community wellness and overcome barriers to social and economic integration by building language and leadership skills.

The Impact
We envision a city where immigrants feel welcomed, accomplished, and can express their own opinions, ideas, and concerns freely and without fear or embarrassment. 

In the past 2 years, we have reached over 200 participants that have been part of and benefited from our conversation circles.
9 out of 10 participants reported that they felt more confident when speaking in English, reduced isolation, and accessed information and resources that have helped them improve their sense of belonging in the city.
We have connected most of our participants to opportunities that help them improve their English skills, as well as their personal and professional skills.

Reaching our $15,000 goal will help us:

Provide stipends to all of our facilitators to recognize their hard work and efforts; develop a website and other communication tools to reach out to more people, increase our circles capacity so that more people can join us, and incorporate our organization in the state of Pennsylvania.
Continue improving the evaluation of our outcomes and share meaningful stories that can inform the development of community-based approaches to improving wellness.
With your help, we will work to strengthen the economic, social, and civic vitality of our city and help build an inclusive and welcoming environment for all.

Join Us!

0.question: How does the conversation circles help to improve wellness?
0.answer:
Immigrants experience social isolation, anxiety, and stress resulting from the several barriers they face, such as acculturation, lack of social capital, and difficulty speaking in English. The conversation circles are a safe space where they find support, information and resources, new relationships, and even a lot of fun.
This reduces stress and depression, where the circles serve as a form of therapy and trust-building community-based approach against behavioral health stigma.

basic_story.tagline: The Help Centre for getting treatment to our good friend Mervin
basic_story.story:
Where to Start
“You have advanced lung cancer, it’s stage 4 and I can’t cure this for you. There are several tumours in the left lung which have spread to the pleural cavity and central chest lymph node.”
That was my news by the consultant looking after me, after my first ever stay in hospital, on the 23rd of June this year. Below I will give you the full run down of my history and this appeal but for now, here are the main ideas

I am going to sensibly try all options available to me to tackle this illness
Some options require more financing than I can afford but I should try everything
This page is for anyone to help me trial every option, for which you will receive my unwaverong love and a wonderful blog to keep you informed of my progress :-) 

Without you, it would be rather a large mountain to climb. Climbing is always better in groups

What We are Doing & What we Need
After spending much time researching and chatting with my Oncologist and local circle of experts, I have the following avenues to explore:

Looking after myself. Low/no alcohol beverages and a great diet (look out for a new Alcohol Free beer in the neighbourhood)
Follow the Oncologist treatments (Osimertinib/Apixoban/Omeprazole/Oxygen Therapy etc)
Using guidance from Herbalists, use recommended doses of THC (the expensive part) 
Keep getting regular check-ups and feedback all information to friends, advisors and backers


The Impact
I have never done a crowd funder before and publicly asking for financial help is quite a humbling experience. I have had a lot of help with setting this all up and given the legal implications understand this could be a rocky road and fully understand my actions. If it all goes to plan and I rid myself of this disease I will obviously be handing over everything I have done to the medical authorities to achieve my goal and cure myself of this cancer. If successful...

I get to led a full and healthy life
Create a full case study for anyone you unfortunately are in a similar position
Campaign for the legalisation of medicinal THC in the UK


Risks & Challenges
The risks are that all of the above and below treatments are not going to work. The challenge will be to remain positive and open to all changes when they occur and also keep an eye out for more treatments and options

I am a very positive person, this will be tested over the next few years.
I will need my very best friends around me


Other Ways You Can Help
Apart from any donations you can always help by being a good friend, staying in touch and sending love and best wishes at regular intervals!
The History part... (long read)
After my night in hospital, the world froze and then shattered. In that split moment I thought.. What do we tell the kids? How long have I got? Can’t I have a new set of lungs? Is this a joke and Jeremy Beadle will rise from the grave and burst through the doors? I wish my Dad was still alive. With the determination not to cry I turned round to see the blood drain from my loving wife’s beautiful face, and then asked ‘What happens next?’
We returned home to the brewery and I told my business partner. We had a moment and he put me straight that this was now my priority and don’t worry about the business, he’s got that covered.
I was assigned an Oncologist who I would meet in a week’s time. The longest week of my life. I did all my crying, sleeping a lot. Telling the kids what had happened and accepting the fact I have cancer. This was also the weekend I “celebrated” my 51st birthday, a rather muted affair and holding on to a secret I didn’t know the magnitude of.
The day came where I met “My Doctor” for the prognosis. Taking in every word like never before, I learnt about non small cell EGFR lung cancer. I was introduced to Osimertinib, the newest of inhibitor drug which has a good chance of working to stop the cancer growing for a while.
How long is difficult to guess, it depends how long my body can cope with taking it. There was a firm list of Do’s and Don’ts in way of living life going forward - she told me I am not to consume any alcohol. Obviously she had done a bit of research on me, which isn’t difficult to do and allowed me 1 pint of beer a day if I have to, and they do not carry over! I was dependent on alcohol apparently, this was easier to cure than we thought, given the circumstances. And yes, there is our own version of alcohol free beer coming soon, however we now have a new obsession in my life that is currently present in my lung. Oh and “if it spreads it will move to your brain which will mean radiotherapy and we will take your driving license off you forever” another hammer blow. We will find this out through the scans. 
I then learnt here about “scanxiety” a word I invented by our pal Les that describes the fear of going in the machines and then the wait for the results. You have no hiding place from a few quick words to influence any outcome. This intelligent lady at the hospital holds all the cards and what a job to have. I few months later after the chemotherapy drugs had set in and my body is showing the results of a healthier lifestyle, I then decided I’m not accepting the cancer death sentence. 
I am going to get rid of it. Never underestimate the power of the positive mind. The body also produces its own chemicals through happiness and euphoria that fight the killer T cells. I am lucky to have some Gp’s in my circle of friends that confirmed this. Even my oncologist agreed that this is the case, however there is no science to back this up so it can’t be proved. Hereby lies the rub. Anything that has not been through the western medical classification system cannot be approved by the NHS, for sure I have seen a further GP and fully trained herbalist for a recommendation of natural remedies that will complement the Osimertinib and Apixoban and now Omeprazole(prescribed drugs) that wont conflict with the good work they are doing in keeping me alive.
Hopefully stopping the growth and spread of the cancerous cells. I have embarked on oxygen therapy at the Wessex MS center that involves being put in a hyperbaric chamber under 2 bar of pressure and breathing pure (98%)oxygen for an hour. This is a private course I am funding and also absorbing the 1 hour journey each way 2 to 3 times a week. My brewery partner has taken all this in his stride with extra work on his behalf and we are employing more staff to cover for my absence. THC is widely seen as the work of snake oil salesmen by the majority of Doctors due to lack of evidence and results of extensive research, however I have read many reports and believe this is part of the cure. Procuring a bag of weed is no problem but not what I need. What I am after is specific dosage and percentage of milligrams of THC and produced in a laboratory. This can all be achieved if I choose to move country where this is not illegal . So I am faced with a dilemma. There is a lack of case studies due to it being illegal, there can not be any case studies due to the same reason, therefore there is no evidence and while we go round and round in circles. I haven’t got time to change the law, campaign in parliament and all that goes with it. I do have access to Medical grade THC from the Czech Republic and procured outside of current British law. Some people think it is crazy to go public and disclose my intention to break the law, but this route is very costly and not available yet through our National Health System. This is not the time to get into that but in the coming months and years I’m sure to share this with you all. If all goes to plan then I will be looking to join the campaign to change the law in Westminster, but for now I will climb one mountain at a time…
I am also embarking on various retreats and courses in the alternative medicine world. Prior to any of this I am doing my research and letting all the practitioners know of my current condition and pharmaceutical dependencies as these drugs from the mainstream medicine world. Don’t forget these drugs are also at the forefront of medical research and I fully respect my Oncology team and all the people who dedicate their lives to this. However it is always easier to seek forgiveness than ask permission. I am having all my bodily functions regularly analyzed by the best in the country with blood tests, ECG’s, CT,MRI and PET scans to plot my progress. Thank you for taking the time to read this and if you chose to contribute then hopefully I will owe you the debt of gratitude in helping save my life. I will be setting up a blog to keep you up to date with the progress of all of the above with the help of my mystery digital mastermind currently in Canada….
 
Love and Peace
T.C.A.G.P x

basic_story.tagline: All-natural, university-tested, hangover preventative.
basic_story.story:
Summary
My name is Chad Clark, founder and owner of Brain Surge LLC. (https://brain-surge.com) We specialize in supplements for brain health. I developed our first product for my children when they were forced to attend school remotely due to the COVID pandemic. They had trouble focusing and paying attention, which led to the development of BrainJolt.
Our newest product, PartyOn!, came about through a friend. Backed by a university study, the active ingredients of this product prevent the effects of a hangover with 98% effectiveness. This campaign's purpose is to fund the first production run and provide you with access to PartyOn! before anyone else in the world.
Your contribution not only puts this amazing product in your hands before anyone else, but you will also help grow Brain Surge so we can provide additional products that fight age-related diseases like Alzheimer's, repair brain damage, and enhance child brain development.
 

What We Need & What You Get
How much funding do we need to make PartyOn! a reality?
$40,000

All funds raised support the cost of production, packaging, and shipping.
What do you get for being on the ground floor?

Each support level guarantees at least one bottle of PartyOn!Choose a support level that's inline with your interests.
What happens if we don't reach our goal?
If we don't reach our goal, we will refund everyone's pledges. 

The Impact

No more wondering if you should go out with your friends.
No more dread about the next morning.
No more headaches, nausea, or brain fog.

Go out and have a great time!
Other Ways You Can HelpTo all our supporters; Thank you and please share this campaign with your friends.Let's make hangovers a thing of the past with PartyOn!

0.question: When do I take PartyOn!?
0.answer: Approximately 30 minutes before you begin drinking alcohol.

1.question: How many doses of PartyOn! do I take?
1.answer: Two caps will work for most people. Three caps my be required if you have more lean muscle mass, or if you drink a lot, frequently.

2.question: Will PartyOn! prevent me from becoming drunk?
2.answer: No! PartyOn! does NOT prevent drunkenness.

basic_story.tagline: We are creating a year-round outdoor community pool inspired by the redwoods that surround us.
basic_story.story: ABOUT      We are launching the Scotia Lodge Swim Club as Humboldt County's newest community-minded space. The new pool, hot tub and deck will be seamlessly integrated into the existing historic building and grounds the  Scotia Lodge- incorporating our heritage trees, lawn, and architecture. Introducing this new concept to a century-old hotel will breathe new life into a long-cherished community gathering space.    We envision a Swim Club that hosts swim lessons, fitness classes, meetings, birthday parties, and quiet mornings by the pool. Humboldt County is a rural and remote part of California, with only one community pool. There is absolutely nothing like this in our region, and we believe this crowdfunding campaign will create a space for community health and wellness as well as an innovative venue for social and professional gatherings.     We have the designs and plans, but we need you to help open the Scotia Lodge Swim Club in 2022. Won’t you dive in with us?THE PLANSThe Swim Club will be located near what was once the World's Largest Redwood Mill, so it is only fitting that the entire sun deck be constructed of redwood. This local material matches the rest of the Lodge and is naturally mold resistant, which makes it ideal to use as a deck that surrounds a pool and hot tub. The pool and hot tub will be from Mod Pools which repurposes shipping containers. Each pool houses it's own heating system which makes them more efficient than traditional pools. We have submitted the plans and applied for the permit. To see our Phase 2 Plans, click here.THE HISTORY      Since its creation,  The Scotia Lodge has hosted locals and travelers from all around the world. Originally built in 1923 as The Mowatoc Hotel, the hotel was likened to a small-scale version of “the grand resort hotels of the national parks'' and served as a stagecoach stop between the Bay Area and Eureka. Later, it became the Scotia Inn and was a centerpiece of the region, hosting guests from all over the world, grand weddings, and holiday celebrations.       Over the years, the Scotia Inn was neglected. In 2018, it closed its doors. Humboldt Social purchased the hotel from The Town of Scotia in early 2021 and has carefully restored the space while preserving its historic integrity, including the Craftsman-era woodwork and antique clawfoot tubs. We renamed the hotel the Scotia Lodge as a nod to the hotel's home in the heart of Redwood Country.The Scotia Lodge features 22 guest rooms, a grand lobby, ballroom, dining lounge, indoor and outdoor event spaces, and the Main + Mill restaurant and bar. Named after the intersection where the Lodge sits, Main + Mill serves classic road food (salads, burgers, and filling entrees) and craft Americana cocktails in its full bar.  It has never had a pool and with the addition of the swimming pool, hot tub, and sundeck (all connected to the outdoor lawn area), we will create the ultimate Humboldt hangout spot.THE PLACE The Scotia Lodge is located in Scotia, California in Humboldt County, nestled among the redwoods that it was built from. We acknowledge and appreciate that the building is situated on the territory of the Sinkyu-ne (Sinkyone) Peoples. We believe that this land was called Tokenewolok by the Wiyot and Kahs-cho ken-tel-te by the Lolahnkok Sinkyone. We are grateful to be able to work on Sinkyu-ne lands and strive to be good guests.Surrounded by the Avenue of the Giants and tucked into the banks of the Eel River, the town of  Scotia is the perfect spot to view the sunset over the Lost Coast mountain range. Scotia is close to the farms of Southern Humboldt where the climate is ideal for producing cannabis, wine and organic produce. It's location right off of  Highway 101 makes it a convenient location for those experiencing the endless natural wonders of the Redwoods State and National Parks.THE TEAM      At Humboldt Social, we create hospitality spaces that connect travelers with our local community. We see crowdsourcing as an extension of that community building. Humboldt Social is a Humboldt-County based hospitality group. Co-Founders Amy and Jon O’Connor lead the team behind two boutique hotels, waterfront cabins, and three restaurants and bars. Our design aesthetic highlights the history and beauty of the North Coast, with an emphasis on reclaimed materials, vintage furnishings, greenery, and lots of natural light. All of our spaces are designed to be welcoming and low-key retreats from daily life. To learn more, visit www.humboldt-social.comSunset at the Humboldt Bay Social Club (photo by Macy Brisben)QUALIFICATIONS      Humboldt Social creates unique lodging, dining, and event spaces that welcome visitors like family. We curate authentic, integrated travel experiences that reflect the richness of our region. We are passionate about introducing our guests to Humboldt’s unique resources- our redwoods, beaches, cannabis farms, and creative community. Our team loves living and working in Humboldt County, and has been an integral part of the restoration of each element of the Lodge. Other projects include the restoration of a World War II blimp base on the Samoa peninsula into the Humboldt Bay Social Club, and the creation of the Papa & Barkley Social space in Eureka. The Scotia Lodge and the Scotia Lodge Swim Club is our most exciting project yet.THE PERKSWe have collaborated with some of our favorite local makers to bring you an exciting array of bespoke perks, including advance purchase of daily pool passes, monthly and annual Swim Club Memberships. We also have delicious experiences, fun swag, and limited edition items that will only available for a single day.  These make the perfect Holiday gift to give! Upon the successful ending of the campaign, you will be emailed a certificate to print and give to your loved ones, friends or co-workers. Due to supply chain challenges for some perks, the certificate will be redeemable when items are received. Give the gift of an experience and an investment in community connection.

0.question: When will the Scotia Lodge Swim Club open?
0.answer: We are aiming to have the pool constructed and ready to open in 2022!

1.question: Will I get my rewards before the 2021 Holidays?
1.answer:
Some will be! However, supply chain issues are always possibile....so let's get creative!
-You can print out the reward you purchased and give the print-out in a wrapped up box (the bigger the box, the more fun when your loved one opens it) with a note saying that the real physical gift will arrive in January 2022.

basic_story.tagline: You can bring much needed relief to people suffering without critical medications and care items.
basic_story.story:
Legality & Similar Concerns
Especially if you just watched the video in which I forgot to address some of the key risks, please follow the FAQ link where I answer some of the common questions that are coming in about legality, customs, and supporting this effort longterm.
FAQ: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/deliver-critically-needed-medications-to-lebanon/x/23449691#/faq
Background
In 2018, Lebanon was struck with a catastrophic economic collapse due to decades of corruption and mismanagement in their government. The value of their currency plunged and eventually it became nearly impossible to import goods from other places. It has reached the level of a major humanitarian crisis in 2021 in which Lebanese people cannot even find aspirin and children are sick and dying from easily treatable maladies.
This is a great article if you're interested in how the situation came about:  https://www.thenation.com/article/world/lebanon-financial-collapse/
I have always wanted to visit Lebanon. From childhood, when our closest family friend threw dinner parties with spreads of kibbeh, manaquish, and sublime Lebanese rice, with memories of his family and the intersection of cultures they came from, even to my adulthood when I tasted Lebanese wine and wondered, "how is this so beautiful?," visiting Lebanon has been a lifelong dream. And with my eyesight deteriorating rapidly, it is now or never.
Sadly, the economic situation has only worsened and the delta variant is tearing through the country. Cancellation seemed like the sensible course of action. I didn't mind seeing a country when it's not at its best, but I also didn't want to be a burden on it.
Inspiration
When I found out that one of my contacts in Beirut had been hospitalized with Covid, I began googling to find out what kind of care he would receive and what he might need. I came across articles and tweets of Lebanese showing how they stuffed their luggage full of critically needed items (e.g. https://observers.france24.com/en/middle-east/20210730-lebanon-medicine-shortage-expats-bring-home-medication) when returning to the country. I realized I could do the same and repurpose my trip for something less self-serving.
I am flying out of JFK on Wednesday with my bags full of medicines and personal care items. I have already spent about $3000 on OTC products and prescription medications shipped from a doctor (who is actually an angel) in California. I am working with the Osman family who've coordinated lists of needs from Ashraf Pharmacy in Beirut and from a pharmacist working with Doctors Without Borders in the Beqaa Valley to plan how best to use the remaining space. But some of these medications are very expensive: one is $15/pill and honestly I had no idea asthma inhalers were $400! So I'm asking your help in filling up my bags to save some lives.
We know it's not a longterm solution. But in the near term, I am a man with three suitcases, and there's no reason not to leverage this opportunity to ease some pain.

What We Need
It's pretty simple

I am raising $10,000 to subsidize the actual medications and personal care items
I need New York metro area doctors who can assist with prescriptions and procurement
Share with anyone in your network who can contribute

Risks
This isn't a low-risk endeavor, so I want to be candid about what some of the risks are and how we're managing them.

Theft: always a risk with luggage. The strategy here is to put the valuable medicines in my hand-carried bags and use the luggage for things of lower value. I think this will be effective, and the fact is that antacids, anti-diarrheals, ibuprofen, antifungal creams, etc. are low value to thieves.
Customs: I feel somewhat confident in this area since I'm going to be among a hundred plus people who've done a very similar thing. I'm also receiving practical advice now from experienced medicine mules and I even have a few tricks up my sleeves from when my family lived in Egypt (like placing menstruation products on the top) that used to work great at getting us through.
Transport: Ahmad Osman has volunteered to pick me up and get these items to the right people (as well as supporting me non-stop in planning for the last four days in spite of having just had surgery and being very busy--thank you!). He's already looking out for and preventing the dumb things that tourists like me can do coming out of an airport. 
Insufficient Prescriptions to Buy What's Needed: This is our biggest risk currently, but the management of it is not difficult in the sense that we can still buy more OTC items or work with our Medicins sans Frontieres pharmacist to find another channel.

Ultimately, if some portion is stolen or confiscated, the sheer quantity we're bringing will more than offset it.
Here's What You're Buying
This is a rapidly-evolving list but will give you a sense of what I'm taking. For the more expensive prescription drug items, our budget gets us around 10 courses of treatment for most. The OTC items have been purchased much larger bulk quantities to maximize luggage space.

Ibuprofen syrup (pediatric) x10
Azithromycin (pediatric) x5
antiemitic (adult) Domperidone or US equiv x5
antiemitic (pediatric) Domperidone or US equiv x5
antibacterial Cefixime (pediatric) x10
antibacterial Cefixime (adults) x5
Augmentin/amoxicillin (pediatric) x10
Augmentin/amoxicillin (adults) x5
Voltaren or US equiv x10
Ciprofloxacin (adult) x10
Topical corticosteroid cream x10
Topical antibacterial cream x10
antifungal (adult) Daktarin or US equiv (monistat) x10
antifungal (pediatric) Daktarin or other oral gel/oral cream can be used in infants x10
Probitiotic for pediatric with diarrahea x10
Relvar inhalers x10 (2 so far)
Ramipril 10mg x10
Moxonidine or US equiv
Clopidogrel 75mg x10 (have 360ct so far)
Metronidazole syrup or US equiv x10
Acetaminophen/Ibuprofen combo pain reliever (4x bulk bottles)
Multivitamin male x10 (or equiv in bulk bottles)
Multivitamin female x10 (or equiv in bulk bottles)
Multivitamin generic (or equiv in bulk bottles)
Multivitamin pediatric x10 (or equiv in bulk)
Omeprazole 20mg (x10)
Acetaminophen otc x3 bulk bottles
cough drops (adult or ped) x4 bulk pouches
First aid kits
Band aids
Sleep aids
Vitamid C
adult probiotic
anti-diarrheal otc
melatonin 5mg
vitamin d3 50mg
fish oil supplements
menstruation products
anti-allergy adult
anti-allergy pediatric
batteries
nutrition bars
high-protein snack
small individually wrapped sweet for kids

0.question: How can I see the impact of my donation?
0.answer: I will follow up on this campaign here, on Twitter (@RabbiMarsChen), and my Facebook feed on our progress throughout the week. We are managing the effort with a Google Doc to stay on budget and coordinate buying. At the end I will post the full accounting with receipts.

1.question: Who's involved?
1.answer: This effort is being run by myself (Brian Chambers) and Ahmad Osman. We are coordinating everything in each of our countries. Big thank you to those who've helped enormously already: Maya Osman, Farah Mansour, Arezou Minooee, and Victoria Jent.

2.question: Is it legal to cross the border with these items?
2.answer: We are only focused on OTC items and prescription items for essential needs like antibiotics, anti-diarrheal, antifungal, etc. Though I'm sure the need is even more severe, I've excluded narcotics and other types of scheduled substances because it would not be legal to cross the border with them.

3.question: Will Customs confiscate these items?
3.answer: It's is always a risk that Customs will confiscate something at their discretion; however, hundreds of Lebanese are returning every day with similarly packed suitcases. I've joined a Lebanese FB group where I'm getting tons of good advice on how to do this successfully and with most-needed goods. Customs are allowing these items to pass through and so far are not giving anyone grief about it. I feel confident this will not be an issue.

4.question: Is it legal to write these prescriptions?
4.answer: I'll be honest, I am not 100% sure about these scenarios where drugs are going for generic humanitarian purposes as opposed to a known recipient. In some cases, we are getting recipeints' names to put on the bottles. For the remainder of the prescription meds, we are obtaining them under the name of the receiving pharmacists since they are the only ones ultimately qualified to know to whom they can go.

5.question: If I write a prescription, how do I know who it's really going to?
5.answer: Both of the pharmacists assisting with this project are close relations to this project's co-owner, Ahmad Osman. I have also had personal communication with them, and they are deeply knowledgeable. Both Maya and Farah have additionally made themselves available on WhatsApp for any physicians who have questions about the items that are being requested.

6.question: Isn't this just a short-term bandaid?
6.answer: It is, yes. But the crisis right now is so severe that hundreds of bandaids are keeping some people alive. I am hoping to continue this project in some capacity after I return. I believe if it can be done in partnership with MSF and sites like MedsForLebanon, a much better system could be set up to deliver these items continuously. In the short term, it was important to me not to miss the opportunity to fill three empty suitcases, so that's the scope of this effort.

7.question: How do I know the money is being spent on these items?
7.answer: I invited Ahmad to co-own this effort with me so that it could be fully transparent from both the fundraising and receiving ends. Additionally, there is a large Google doc spreadsheet we are using to track every request, estimated cost, actual cost, as well as keep an image of each receipt. If you're a donor on this project and would like access, just email me brian@bdchambers.com. I want this to be as transparent as possible.

8.question: When will everything be accounted for with receipts etc.?
8.answer: With only two days to go before I depart, I am 100% focused at the moment on procurement. But as soon as that phase concludes and I'm settled in Beirut, I can post all the receipts and reconcile the spreadsheet very quickly.  Full accounting will be available by 9/3/21. Just come back to the campaign and click on the Updates tab.

0.name: by Brian D Chambers
0.update:
I wanted to give a quick update now that I'm back in the States. I spent nearly four weeks in Istanbul after I left Beirut, and ai made one final med run at the end when I realized I could procure something that was much needed cheaply from a Turkish pharmacy. Needless to say, most of my time was spent enjoying the company of friends and making several new ones. It was a fantastic experience and both med runs went off without a hitch.
I am now left with the items which did not fit in the suitcases after our massive re-packing efforts. Shockingly, only about 20% of the items were left in NYC; and they are almost entirely preventative and personal care items. The plan is to mail all remaining meds and then decide (based on the price of mailing a box) whether the best destination for the remaining items is Beirut or a local charity. I'll continue to update until everything has been allotted.
Here is what remains:

Thank you again to everyone who supported this project.

basic_story.tagline: Unique sound healing experiences that transform your stress and anxiety into peace and joy!
basic_story.story: Hello Friends,I’m Heather Mullin and I created Healing Harmony to bring the transformational power of sound healing to you and everyone you know!  Everyone? YES! I’m so passionate about this because I know I can transform your stress and anxiety into joy and peace. Healing Harmony is a holistic healing practice providing individual and group sound healing treatments, workshops, and retreats. You can support Healing Harmony right now by choosing a PERK below!Sound healing is a gentle, non-invasive holistic healing practice which has been scientifically proven to reduce stress and anxiety, ease depression and grief, and mitigate trauma.  For millennia, societies around the world have been using the many methods of vibrational healing to improve physical, mental, and spiritual health. Funds from this campaign will help propel Healing Harmony to the next level, and allow me to introduce this unique path to wellness, and provide sound healing to as many people as possible. I will use your contribution to purchase equipment, attend training for continued education, and provide free or low cost group healing sessions to non-profits, and people who are unable to access, or find relief, from other healing treatments, such as those who are incarcerated or recovering from trauma. Healing Harmony employs metal singing bowls handcrafted with intention in Nepal. These singing bowls are placed on or around the body and played by striking or rubbing the bowls to produce sound.  Healing sound vibrates our physical bodies at the cellular level to act as a deep tissue sonic massage.  It also heals in an auditory capacity by changing our brain patterns, resetting our “fight or flight” response, and restoring us to a natural state of harmony and balance.Doesn’t that sound great?Healing Harmony was created with profound intention. It is the culmination of my life-long career as a singer, my professional training as a musician, decades of meditation practice, hundreds of public performances, certification in the use of singing bowls for sound healing, and most recently, specific training in the creation of sound and vocal toning for visualized meditation and journey. This healing practice is is also the result of my profound healing journey through stress, anxiety, sexual violence, trauma, surgery, pain, and recovery. The health and wellness industries have been devastated during quarantine, and the realities of living during the time of a pandemic.  In many ways it was not an ideal time to start a sound healing business!  However, the world needs healing, and I sincerely believe in boosting our collective vibrations so that we are all healthier, happier people, who desire to lift others up rather than tear them down.Please visit https://www.healingharmonyllc.org/for more information.  And if you know someone who might be interested in sound healing and could benefit from this transformational experience, please forward this campaign!

0.question: What is sound healing?
0.answer: Sound healing is a holistic healing method used around the world utilizing the vibration of sound to intentionally heal the physical, emotional, and spiritual bodies. The universe is in a continuous state of vibration. Sound healing moves those vibrations through every cell in your body (like a full-body sonic massage!)  Sound healing also works on an auditory level to decrease stress response, boost the immune system and change our brain patterns from anxiety to peace.

1.question: Why are you creating a sound healing practice now?
1.answer: We are immersed in sound before we are even born.  Our mother's heartbeat and voice are the first things we hear. Music is the universal language of humanity and thus elicits deep emotional, spiritual and physical responses.  The collective global experience and trauma of the pandemic make this the most essential time to begin a holistic healing practice!  There is no better time than right now to begin healing and recovery for ourselves and our communities.

2.question: How will my contribution be spent?
2.answer: I am using the funds I raise with this campaign to maintain my Seattle studio and find larger spaces throughout the Pacific Northwest to facilitate sound healing, I plan to purchase equipment to record and broadcast live to reach more people.  I continue to attend workshops, classes and training for certification in Reiki, mindfulness, trauma sensitivity, and sound healing techniques.

3.question: What will Healing Harmony be doing in 5 years?
3.answer: Healing Harmony plans to create a sound healing space available to everyone. Anticipated expansion includes both an urban healing center and a mountain retreat center for longer sound healing experiences. Healing Harmony is developing corporate training to provide sound healing, meditation and mindfulness practices in the work place which will be presented to corporations throughout the United States.

basic_story.tagline: An educational doc that examines the lived realities of those living with mental health disorders.
basic_story.story:
The Naked Truth
Did you know that 1 in 5 adults suffers from a mental health condition such as depression, bipolar, anxiety, and schizophrenia? According to the Health and Human Services Office of Minority Health, African Americans are 20% more likely to experience serious mental health problems than the general population. When we examine the statistics and realize how ethnicity, socioeconomic status, environmental factors, stigma, and other barriers play a role in one's access to traditional treatment or willingness to seek therapy, it appears to be an injustice.
“Behind the Mask: My Naked Truth”  is an educational documentary which examines the proximal mechanisms in which stigmas are formulated. It also serves as a vehicle to provide those living with a mental health condition, a means to communicate their lived realities to the masses―ultimately shedding light on the pain and the needs of those suffering in silence.
 

We Will Listen!
"Behind the Mask: My Naked Truth" is created and executive produced by national bestselling author, N’Tyse, CEO of A Million Visions Productions and our award-winning director Arthur Muhammad of "Carter High”, (starring Charles Dutton, Vivica Fox, Pooch Hall, David Banner ... ).  Joining us is the National Association of Mental Illness (NAMI) ambassador, licensed psychotherapist and former Miss International, Miss Elise Banks, student and staff psychologist (Southern Methodist University) Dr. Abel Tomatis, and Congresswoman Eddie Bernice Johnson, along with a host of other guests.


Your Pledge Matters
With your support, we can have the mental health conversation aloud and truly make a difference in our community! When we reach our $3,000.00  fundraising goal through our Indiegogo campaign, it will allow our team to begin principal photography and further our research studies. Your contribution is critical to our success. How inspiring it is, to know that your support is not only helping us to produce an educational film, but that collectively, we will have a vital role in this shift in consciousness.        
#IWillListen #WeWillListen #BehindTheMaskFilm #LetsHaveTheConversation You can also lend a helping hand by becoming a project ambassador. Contact Lu'Netta McGraw or Ayanna Verser via email at info.amvps@gmail.com to get acquainted and receive your first assignment. Please be sure to include BTM Ambassador in the Subject line. And if you’re curious, our ambassadors receive the red carpet treatment as well.

basic_story.tagline: Breathing Together
basic_story.story:
I grew up with ADHD in a time when it wasn’t understood, I had a hard time in life. It wasn’t until my late 20’s that I discovered belly breathing. This effective technique had a profound effect on me personally and helped lead me to where I am today.  As a mother, yoga teacher and mindfulness instructor, I spend a lot of time working with children who have difficulties with attention, whether from anxiety, trauma, depression, or attention deficit disorders.  Often calming is necessary for the class and individuals to function. Since I have personally experienced the benefits of belly breathing, I have shared this with my students, including my own children, with impressive results.  It was tricky figuring out how to teach children the abstract concept of diaphragmatic breathing to children, while keeping them engaged long enough to experience the benefits. That’s when I created BellieBuddies!
BellieBuddies are little plush toys, designed to ergonomically fit on a child’s belly. They were designed with weighted tummies to provide bio-feedback, are tall enough to be seen while lying down, and are wide enough to prevent falling off.  BellieBuddies are a fun and simple way to teach breath to kids so it actually makes sense to them. Breathing with a BellieBuddie is like playing a fun game with your breath. This keeps kids engaged long enough to experience some of the benefits, such as relaxation, balance, mood stabilization, and stress release. Using classical conditioning principals, children relate BellieBuddie breathing to feelings of wellbeing.  This activates the reward centers in the brain, making them want to do it again and again, triggering these positive effects.  We all know that when we do things repetitively, we condition ourselves to have an automatic response.  Imagine if you could help your children learn to have an automatic response of relaxation, instead of stress or anxiety.  I know this is possible, as I have seen it work with many of my students!  That is why I created BellieBuddies.
I am asking for your help.  The first stage, the design and production of the first BellieBuddie, Sakhe, the dolphin, is complete. The money from this campaign will be used for the second phase which is the creation of companion books, training videos for educators, downloadable meditations, stories, and mindfulness videos for kids. If we go over our goal we will use those funds for stage 3 which is more animal designs, website resources, and advertising strategy.  The sooner we get the BellieBuddie project funded, the more families we can serve by introducing them to the benefits of belly breathing and mindfulness.
We are asking you to purchase a ‘raw’ BellieBuddie, meaning just the plush toy without the companion book or training videos, which are still under development, pending the success of this funding effort.  When you purchase your BellieBuddie today, you will receive your very own Sakhe, the dolphin within 4 weeks.
We are confident that we will reach our goal of selling 1,200 BellieBuddies. However, if we do not, we will use the money we do raise to further develop the full BellieBuddie concept, with the meditation downloads and training videos first on our list.  We appreciate your help and support and would LOVE to see you with Sahke, the dolphin in your home. Thank you.
Please consider helping BellieBuddies reach our goal by sharing campaign on Social media.

basic_story.tagline: I need $15,000 to buy prosthetic leg
basic_story.story:
About me and some background
ENG/日本語
Hello, and thanks for visiting my IndieGoGo campaign page. My name is Mio Nakamura, 39 years old woman, who lives in Tokyo JAPAN. My friends suggested me and I thought this is the time for crowdfunding, so I am typing this right now. (I supposed to launch on GoFundMe, but they don't support for Japanese citizen.)On the 17th of May 2017, I got a high fever and passed out at work. A few days later, my knee started swelling aggressively and I had to stay in the hospital straight away. I was diagnosed with a malignant tumor which name is “Undifferentiated Pleomorphic Sarcoma”, incidence rate is 1/100,000.In July of that year, sarcoma has been removed, After some months of chemotherapy, but still had possibilities of metastasis and recurrence. I considered for the next decades of years and quality of life, so I decided and got amputation surgery as my doctor recommended in January 2018.
 
私の名前は中村美緒です。日本・東京在住の39歳の女性です。友人の提案により、まさに今がそのときではないかと思い、初めてクラウドファンディングを利用することにしました。（医療系に特化したGoFundMeを使いたかったのですが、現在日本人には利用できません。）2017年の5月17日、職場で勤務中に突然の高熱に襲われ、同時に右ひざが猛烈に腫れ始め、即時入院することになりました。精密検査の結果、悪性腫瘍であり、10万人に1人の発症率といわれる「未分化多形成肉腫」という肉腫であると診断されました。同年7月、肉腫を摘出ののち、数ヶ月の抗がん剤治療はやや効果がみられましたが、転移・再発の可能性を拭い去れることはなく、今後の人生の質などを考慮した結果、2018年1月に足切断手術をするに至りました。

Things I need are...
I have been in rehabilitation center 3 months and getting training 5 days a week at the moment. I suppose to leave here pretty soon, And choosing my first prosthetic leg, it will cost me $15,000. Details:Socket parts/ $2,000Knee parts/ ossur TK2000/ $5,000Leg parts/ $4,300Foot parts/ ottoboch 1C30, TK-2052/ $2,000Silicon liner/ $1,000Leg cover/ $200Stump socks x 6, and stocking/ $500現在は都内の施設で週5日のリハビリテーションを受けています。もうすぐ退院の見込みですが、義足代として総額150万円必要です。購入予定のものは以下一式です：ソケット部品/ 20万円膝部品/ オズール社 TK2000/ 50万円脚部品/ 43万円足部品/ オットボック社 1C30, TK-2052/ 20万円シリコンライナー/ 10万円脚部スポンジ外装/ 2万円断端袋 x 6、ストッキング/ $500

My Passion, BurningMan
I am making great progress learning to walk to get back to life. I really am hoping to go to “Burning Man 2018” in August with this prosthetic leg. This is biggest goal for this year!この義足をつけ、いちはやく実生活へ戻り自立し、8月下旬アメリカで開催される「バーニングマン」へ参加するのが目標です。

Thank you for reading this far!
A donation of any kind will be greatly appreciated and a huge help. Also, please feel free to share to anyone you think might be interested.Thank you for your time and consideration of this effort to help! Love to all everyone.Sincerely,-Mio Nakamuraこの状況に理解・共感していただくことができましたら、ぜひご支援を宜しくお願い致します。またご友人、興味のある方へのシェアをお願いします！中村美緒

basic_story.tagline: Our app allows those with allergies to eat out worry-free, with more safety.
basic_story.story:
A Summary of My Allergy ID
We are a group of under 18 girls from Newcastle and we have started My Allergy ID as part of the Young Enterprise scheme, which we hope to succeed in as well as make an impact on the catering industry. We hope to empower sufferers of food allergies to be able to make more informed decisions about what they eat, no matter where and what they are eating.
Our idea stemmed from the headlined, shocking stories in the news recently of food allergy suffers dying after consuming products from high-street cafes, which were incorrectly labelled. After seeing these stories we knew that something had to change; this terrible mistake could easily reoccur and have an equally devastating result. So, we have created My Allergy ID, an app which will eradicate this problem and massively aid both consumers and eateries, which we are in collaboration with, when it comes to food allergens.
We would really appreciate your help and funding as, with this our app has the potential to save lives and change the way food-allergy sufferers eat forever.

What We Need & What You Get
We hope to raise £500 and with this we can work to further developing our app . We as a company do not need £500 pounds so we will be donating a quarter of the money we raise to The Anaphylaxis Campaign. This is charity solely focused on supporting people at risk of severe allergic reactions, which is exactly the group of people we hope to support. Your funds would help us to launch our app as soon as possible, before this error could be made again and another life could be taken due to a easily-made mistake.

The Impact
It is clear to see what a huge impact our app could have on, not only the UK, but in time the world at large. This is going to change the way food-allergen sufferers eat forever - with security and comfort. I am sure if you, yourself, either suffer from food-allergies or know someone who does, you will know what a massive burden this can be for some people and what major precautions they need to take. This app will be so valuable to the world and the catering industry, because of its promotion of ease, convenience but most importantly safety.

Risks & Challenges
Due to our age, we have little expertise in approaching larger businesses in the catering sector. This is a step we need to take to generate awareness and also to start to amke our way into larger highstreet chain stores, where it will have the most impact. We have already generated great interest from a few one-store cafes and plan to trail our app here as soon as it is launched. To overcome this we have contacted a particular highstreet cafe for guidance and advice on approaching larger businesses, which has been really valuable and helpful.
We are aware that creating an app has its risks due to the nature of it being a huge success or just a flop. However, we really believe in what we have created and we have no doubt that it has the potential to become a huge success and one day something that people will struggle to consider not having. We are prepared to take this risk due to such strong belief that it could change the catering industry and the way people eat forever.

Other Ways You Can Help
If contributing is not an option for you, there are many other ways you can help us. Something we are focusing on at the moment is getting the word out and raising awareness of our app and this campaign. This is a key element and any support in anyway would be hugely appreciated. So please share our campaign on social media by using Indiegogo share tools because we believe our app has the potential to save lives and to the mass it provides the security and safety when buying food, that is missing in the industry at present.

0.question: When will we be able to get and use the app?
0.answer: As soon as possible. Our app will be finishes in 4-5 weeks and then we will approach businesses who may be interested.

basic_story.tagline: Chubby teddy bears to help manage anxiety with customizable weight, heat, scent, and more.
basic_story.story: Chonkers are Premium Therapeutic Stuffed Animals  that allow you to add calming weight, heat, scent, and more to naturally relax.     With a variety of interchangeable Sensory Packs,  Chonkers allow you endless options to adjust to your preferences or mood. You can add weight up to 8 lbs, microwavable heat, cooling, and relaxing scents to customize to what calms you.Chonkers are specifically designed to help find what calms you and recreate that relaxation technique. Anxiety is not one size fits all and neither is how you manage it, which is why we designed Chonkers to be compatible with multiple interchangeable Sensory Packs.  The combination of different Sensory Packs allows you to take advantage of a variety of occupational therapy techniques shown to help manage anxiety and improve mood, customizing your Chonker for what is most effective for you.    Calming   Comfort  Customizable   Meet Chonky Bear! For pre-order we will be offering perks for supporters of an adorably chubby version of a classic Teddy Bear, Chonky Bear and a selection of 4 different Sensory Packs.   Chonky Bear is a premium super-soft plush Bear built to be durable while remaining soft and breathable. The bear is 16" in height so large enough for adults as well as children, but able to be condensed for traveling by removing packs.  The back of Chonky Bear features a hidden zippered enclosure to add multiple Sensory Packs. The enclosure is double-lined to support up to 8 lbs of weight.  Each Sensory Pack is designed to be soft and cuddlable within your Chonker but has a different feel, weight, or effect that makes it unique. All packs are easily removable and can be used alone or with any other pack.  There will be 4 different Sensory Packs to choose from at launch: Weight, Heat, Heat + Lavender, and Plush. You can include up to 2 packs at once to add up to 8 lbs of weight or to combine effects like heat and weight.  Adding weight allows you to take advantage of a therapeutic technique known as deep touch stimulation, a  method of adding concentrated pressure to the body to calm the nervous system and promote relaxation.         This technique has become popular among Occupational Therapists and in hospitals as a natural method to calm anxiety. The weight provides a sensation of security much like you experience from cuddling, receiving a hug, or a child being swaddled.        Each weighted pack is 4 lbs and each Chonker can hold 2 packs at a time. There is no particular perfect weight for everybody as it is largely a matter of preference and can change over time as you acclimate to the sensation; however, between plush, heat, and weighted packs you can go from 1 lb to 8 lbs in seconds to find the perfect weight for you.Heat Sensory Packs allow you to warm up your Chonker to take advantage of the soothing physical and mental benefits of Heat Therapy. Pop your Heat Sensory Pack in the microwave for 1 minute and it will remain warm for over 2 hours within your Chonker. Add it to the freezer for 2 hours and it will stay cool for an hour.         Applying heat to areas of your body can naturally soothe and improve the flow of oxygen through your blood stream.  The improved blood flow is why heat packs have been popular for so long when sick or recovering from an injury, or dealing with cramps as it increases the extensibility of collagen tissues, decreasing joint stiffness, pain and relieving muscles in a post-acute phase of healing while increasing the flow of proteins, nutrients, and oxygen to the affected area.The Heat packs are also able to be cooled to help with pain management and general comfort.  Like using ice packs or ice baths, cold is great for recovery by reducing blood flow to a particular area of your body you can help reduce inflammation and pain.There is nothing worse than trying to sleep through hot, sticky summer nights, CHONKERS are the "cool side of the pillow" that will stay cooler longer. Beyond just comfort, the temperature can be very helpful as soothing sensory input for calming panic attacks, over-stimulation, or anger episodes.The Heat + Lavender Sensory Packs have the same effects as the Heat Pack but with  the additional benefit of Lavender added. Using scents as a relaxation aid has been used for ages and is known as Aromatherapy. Aromatherapy is simply the use of scents to trigger a reaction from your mind. The connections that your mind makes to particular scents can trigger this without you even knowing. Adding naturally calming scents like Lavender stimulates relaxing responses from your brain's limbic system. This works very similar to using a relaxing scented candle, a bubble bath, a sleep spray, essential oils, or sleeping with comforting smell of a loved ones sweatshirt to help you calm down or sleep better.The Plush Sensory Pack allows you to fluff up your Chonker while adding minimal weight.  The plush pack is similar to a traditional teddy bear with a cushy soft feel that still plumps up his belly depending on how stuffed you want him while continuing to allow you to control the weight.  The TeamOur team of designers and product experts has been working with occupational therapists to create new sensory products for people with anxiety, depression, autism/ASD, and other disorders for 5 years. Personally, throughout my life I have lived with social and generalized anxiety and sought methods to help manage it. In Kindergarten, I used to cut off a small piece of my favorite blanket to keep in my pocket to help me calm me down but have continued to create for effective options in the years since. In 2015, I discovered how the effects of deep pressure could help me calm down and began trying weighted blankets which were popular in the ASD community at the time. While I found them helpful, I also found them to be expensive, bulky, hot, and primarily made in child sizes.I started making my own versions of these blankets to improve them working closely with others using the products and Occupational Therapists to create more affordable and accessible options, eventually founding a company to produce high-quality sensory bedding in 2016. Weighted blankets grew in popularity and became cheaper and better quality, but the inspiration for Chonkers came while still looking for ways to improve on some of the challenges customers and I continued to face like overheating, portability, price, and finding/adapting to the perfect weight even 5 years later.The solution ended up not being bedding at all but a stuffed animal that could utilize more natural occupational therapy techniques and be personalized to the individual. Chonkers can be used everyday, traveled with, and was more effective. Chonkers is a product that I love and am excited about the opportunity to share with the world.

0.question: Why are they weighted?
0.answer: Sensory products such as weighted blankets and clothing have been used for decades to help reduce anxiety, improve mood, help with insomnia, and promote calm for adults and children. The concentrated weight of Chonkers provides deep touch stimulation when on top of you. This pressure helps relax your nervous system and creates a familiar sense of comfort by increasing serotonin and melatonin levels while decreasing cortisol levels—improving your mood and promoting relaxation.

1.question: How can adding heat help?
1.answer: Heat can be great for comfort, cramps, relaxation, cold nights, and more. The warmth creates a familiar sense of comfort and can provide a form of heat therapy by increasing the extensibility of collagen tissues; decreasing joint stiffness, reducing pain, and relieving muscles in the post-acute phase of healing by increasing blood flow. The increased blood flow to the affected area provides proteins, nutrients, and oxygen for better healing.

2.question: Are Chonkers Machine Washable?
2.answer: Yes! Chonkers are specifically designed so that the inner sensory packs can be easily removed and outer animal can be easily washed in a washing machine.

3.question: How can I add more sensory packs than are included in the Bundle?
3.answer:
When you initially make your pledge there will be a section for Add-ons. You can add as many additional Packs as you would like to your Reward.

If you have already pledged, you can go back to the page and click the "Manage your pledge" button. From there you can update your pledge and add or remove any add-ons.

basic_story.tagline: A fitness studio with a focus on education for sustainable health that showcases a communal kitchen!
basic_story.story:
About Us
Sway Soturi has been a personal trainer and group fitness coach since 2014. Her passion for fitness began after the birth of her son, Lucious. Her excitement for sharing this passion with others, coupled with a desire for knowledge in health and fitness has grown stronger each day.
Sway wants to create an impact in the community. She wants to show people that they can be healthy and gain results through simple practices.
 
Damian Mark has been a professional chef in private restaurants, country clubs, and hotels for the last 18 years. He has worked all over the United States and spent time in Europe honing his craft. He loves food, is passionate about of cooking, and most of all he loves to teach. 
Soturi Fitness and Nutrition will be a community within a community — a place to practice physical fitness, nutrition and mindful health, in California's Silicon Valley. Creating this facility means we can work with more people to create a larger impact on health in the community.
The Soturi Fitness and Nutrition studio will provide a comprehensive wellness experience, without fad diets or fad workout plans. We will offer a variety of fitness classes and health related workshops because we trust in the power of continuing education. Our coaches and fellow members will provide accountability and encouragement for each other. 
We believe it's never too late to set foundations for a healthy lifestyle but we also believe it's easier when you start early so we encourage whole family participation in this journey. 
With your help we can get the gym up and running faster and begin changing lives sooner!
 

What We Need & What It Is For
We are looking to raise $50,000 on Indiegogo (while at the same time applying for a SBA loan). We want to get started as soon as possible!
The funds raised will help us:

Add a communal kitchen space.
Purchase a portion of the equipment needed.
Help with continued education with our coaches to better serve the community. 
Create programs for community outreach. 

 
Below is a rough sketch of our functional movement layout:
​
What if we don't reach our goal?
We will still use the funds for the above purposes. We are determined to build this facility no matter what!

How we are different than other gyms!


Communal kitchen space - 
Members are encouraged to use this space before and after their workouts (or anytime) to prepare healthy food. 
Scheduled cooking workshops to teach the community how to shop, prep, and cook healthy meals efficiently. 
Community cooking and dinner events (including food drive and volunteering events).


We see our members as individuals. Since no two people are the same, we aim to help people reach their goals in ways that are suitable to their lifestyle.

We understand and emphasize the importance of a balanced lifestyle -
We encourage members to take a variety of classes, the yin and the yang. 
We don't neglect recovery - including healthy eating and rest.
We partner with a world-renowned nutrition coaching program powered by Nutrition Precision. 
That doesn't mean we don't have fun! We still love ice cream and chocolates; we just enjoy them more mindfully and in moderation. 




Below is our class schedule for when we open:



We are actively involved with community programs, such as non-profits and schools. 

FunHouse Kids -
A kids care program to genuinely engage your child with structured classes so they can share the love of a healthy life.
Schedules will include -
STEM (science, technology, engineering, and math)
Cooking
FunFood Factor
Arts and crafts
Dance
Kids fitness
Kids obstacle course 





 

The Impact
In addition to the many who seek a healthier life, there is an epidemic of an overweight, and unhappy people in the United States. Many of our youth are not taught the importance of nutrition and healthy living in school or at home and they grow up without a foundation in health. At Soturi Fitness and Nutrition, we are working to empower the community through proper tools and information to live healthier lives. Education and empowerment are our best weapons to support those looking to create healthier lives for themselves and their families.
Soturi Fitness and Nutrition will be working with organizations to help kids live healthier, but that is only the beginning.  We have big dreams (including starting our own health and nutrition foundation and working with a wide variety of non-profits) to reach a wider population and make sure kids are supported too!
We need to be kinder to ourselves and to the world. And by doing so, we can all make this world a better place.
 

Risks & Challenges
We are determined to build this gym! We are in the process of applying for a SBA loan, and the funds raised here will help us build the entire gym the way we envision thus making a bigger impact, instead of scaling it down and taking longer to reach the wider community as we hope to do. 
Check out our website at SoturiFitnessAndNutrition.com
 

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that you may not be able to contribute financially, but there are definitely other ways you can help us share our mission!

Use the Indiegogo share tools on the top right to share on social media - Facebook / Instagram / Twitter.
Talk about Soturi Fitness and Nutrition with your friends, family, co-workers, teachers, students, bartenders, servers, cab drivers, mailman, milkman, exes, and newspaper delivery kids (if they still exist!)

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

0.question: What is Indiegogo and how does crowdfunding work?
0.answer: Indiegogo is a platform to fund ingenious, work-in-progress products and ideas. Although contributing to a campaign is not the same as purchasing a product, when you support a crowdfunding project, you help bring ideas to life!

1.question: How do I select a perk that interests me on this page?
1.answer: On desktop, you’ll see a list with all available perks on the right hand side of the page. Click on the perk you want, then click the "Get This Perk" button to be redirected to the payment page. If you're on a mobile device, scroll up to see all available perks.

2.question: How do I ask the project owner a question?
2.answer: If you’ve already backed this campaign, you can leave a comment on the Comments tab, or send the project owner a direct message. Otherwise, you may be able to contact the project owner through their website or social media accounts.

3.question: Can I change the shipping address for my perk?
3.answer: In most cases, yes.

4.question: Can I change the item, or perk, I selected?

5.question: Can I ask Indiegogo for a refund?
5.answer: Indiegogo does not guarantee that the perks offered by the campaigner will be produced or delivered and is not directly responsible for refunding contributions.

2.name: by Sway Soturi
2.update: Hi Everyone!Hope you are having an incredible start of the week so far :)The campaign has officially ended, with your help we raised over $4000. THANK YOU for your support! For those that have claimed a perk, please be patient and keep an eye on your inbox as we will be giving out updates on our progress  for the gym periodically.  Also, there is a section on our website dedicated to all of you to say THANK YOU for your generosity and kindness (it should be up to date by tomorrow).With that said, we will be putting the funds to good use.First item up - Ultrasound device by BodyMetrix $1895 + tax + shippingNo more guessing. With ultrasound scanning, we can pin point how much fat and muscle at the each area and compare progress. (If you are not measuring, you are guessing!) Instead of stepping on a scale that tells you your combined body fat, now we can see exactly how much fat we are losing and where, or exactly how much muscle we are gaining and where! WOWZA!If any of you would like to come by and try it out just give me a holler and we'll set up a time to measure you!Thank you again for your contribution and encouragement!Love & Happiness,Sway
